They do not appear to have uncommitted regular units in this area. This suggests that second lines of Russian defense may be significantly less heavily defended. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.sentence: While several departments in southeastern France are on maximum alert due to the heat wave, some town halls like this one here are setting up air-conditioned rooms to protect their residents.
